## NestedIncludeQuery type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NestedIncludeQuery<TState, TRel, TRestrictions extends Restrictions = ""> = TRel extends StateModels<TState> ? RestrictedQuery<TState, TRel, IncludeRestrictions extends TRestrictions ? TRestrictions : TRestrictions | IncludeRestrictions> : never;
```
